About DQML 2026

Welcome to DQML 2026


The DQML 2026 conference brings together researchers working on molecular dynamics, quantum effects, and machine learning in materials science and computational chemistry.

The meeting will be held in St. Johann in Tirol, Austria at the Explorer Hotel Kitzbühel from the 2nd of February to the 5th of February 2026.



Confirmed Invited Speakers:

  • Asst. Prof. Julia Westermayr Leipzig University
  • Asst. Prof. Matthias Sachs Lancaster University
  • Asst. Prof. Sean Kavanagh University of Cambridge
  • Dr. Johan Runeson University of Freiburg


Organisers

  • Assist. Prof. Katherine Inzani University of Nottingham
  • Prof. Reinhard Maurer University of Warwick/University of Vienna
  • Assoc. Prof. Alexander Ganose Imperial College London
  • Ash Baldwin University of Vienna
  • Alex Spears University of Vienna
  • Dr. Lukas Hörmann University of Vienna
  • Dr. Ross Amory University of Nottingham
  • Viktor Ellingsson Imperial College London
  • Dr. Wojciech Stark Imperial College London
